http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#com.value: Freeskiing ist eine Art des Skifahrens im Bereich des Extremsports. Es geht darum, möglichst eindrucksvoll verschiedene Tricks auszuführen, Hindernisse zu überwinden oder über sogenannte „Obstacles” zu gleiten (sliden). Die verwendeten Ski sind TwinTips, vorne und hinten hoch gebogen, um Rückwärtsfahren und Landen zu ermöglichen.

Newschool -laskettelu on yksi laskettelun tyylisuunta. Newschool -laskettelussa yhdistetään aineksia lumilautailusta ja rullalautailusta suksilla laskemiseen. Newschool -hiihtoa pidetään laskettelua uudistavana nuorekkaana tyylisuuntana. Se on freestyle-lautailun vastine suksilla suoritettuna: mukana ovat kaikki samat osatekijät kuin lumilautailussakin, hyndät, reilit, pipet, pressit ym. , joita laskijat käyttävät hyväkseen.

Freeskiing, or Newschool skiing is a specific type of skiing. It is a subset of Freestyle skiing, although many participants view it as a separate sport and do not refer to it as freestyle. The sport does not require participants to compete, but there are competitive events available at every level of the sport. There are currently two Olympic freeskiing events, Superpipe and Slopestyle. These events make up two of the four Olympic freestyle skiing events.

Friåkning, skidåkning som publiceras genom foton i skidtidningar och filmer. Utvecklades från Hot Dog-kulturen på 70-talet till extremskidåkning med Jesper Rönnbäck och hans kumpaner i Free Radicals. Utvecklades till dagens jibbing med namn som Jon Olsson och Jacob Wester Framgångsrika svenska profiler är också Sverre Lillieqvist och Kaj Zachrisson som är kärnan i Swedish Posse

Il newschool skiing è una nuova disciplina sciistica freestyle, esistente da non più di 10 anni. Nato prevalentemente negli USA, il freestyle newschool è ispirato allo snowboard da cui ha preso numerosi trick (evoluzioni) e lo stile nel senso più generale.

Freeskiing ou Newschool e um estilo de esqui que envolve manobras, saltos, e as características do terreno do parque, tais como calhas, caixas, lanças, ou outros obstáculos. O formato resultou de uma combinação do crescimento da popularidade do snowboarding, bem como da progressão do esqui Freestyle. "Newschoolers", ou aqueles que especificamente esquiam neste estilo (em oposição a freestylers tradicionais, os esquiadores de montanha grande, pilotos, etc.

Freeskiing - narciarstwo polegajace na skakaniu na skoczniach i wykonywaniu w powietrzu ewolucji takich jak: obroty, salta, graby (chwyty za narte w locie) oraz na slizganiu sie po poreczach (railach) i boksach - podobnie do tricków wykonywanych na snowboardzie. Sport ten dzieli sie na kilka konkurencji: big air - skoki wykonywane z duzej, pojedynczej skoczni. slopestyle - zjazd po specjalnie przygotowanym torze z wieloma skoczniami, boksami i railami.

http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abstract.value: Freeskiing ist eine Art des Skifahrens im Bereich des Extremsports. Es geht darum, möglichst eindrucksvoll verschiedene Tricks auszuführen, Hindernisse zu überwinden oder über sogenannte „Obstacles” zu gleiten (sliden). Die verwendeten Ski sind TwinTips, vorne und hinten hoch gebogen, um Rückwärtsfahren und Landen zu ermöglichen.

Freeskiing - narciarstwo polegajace na skakaniu na skoczniach i wykonywaniu w powietrzu ewolucji takich jak: obroty, salta, graby (chwyty za narte w locie) oraz na slizganiu sie po poreczach (railach) i boksach - podobnie do tricków wykonywanych na snowboardzie. Sport ten dzieli sie na kilka konkurencji: big air - skoki wykonywane z duzej, pojedynczej skoczni. slopestyle - zjazd po specjalnie przygotowanym torze z wieloma skoczniami, boksami i railami. jibbing - jazda po railach, boksach i innych przeszkodach - murki, sciany, drzewa. Jibbing moze byc równiez uprawiany w srodowisku miejskim (urban skiing). halfpipe - ewolucje wykonywane w snieznej rynnie (halfpipi'e) - takiej samej jak snowboardowa Do uprawiania freeskiingu uzywa sie specjalnego rodzaju nart, tzw. twin tip skis, czyli nart o podgietych przodach i tylach, co pozwala na swobodna jazde zarówno przodem, jak i tylem (czyli na switch). Standardowe narty do jazdy w snowparku maja wymiary 115-85-105. Charakteryzuje je równiez wieksza elastycznosc oraz brak podwyzszenia (plyty) pod wiazaniem. Inna odmiana freeskiingu jest freeride, czyli jazda na nartach poza wyznaczonymi trasami. Narty freeride'owe sa znacznie szersze niz zwykle, co poprawia ich zachowanie w glebokim sniegu.

Newschool -laskettelu on yksi laskettelun tyylisuunta. Newschool -laskettelussa yhdistetään aineksia lumilautailusta ja rullalautailusta suksilla laskemiseen. Newschool -hiihtoa pidetään laskettelua uudistavana nuorekkaana tyylisuuntana. Se on freestyle-lautailun vastine suksilla suoritettuna: mukana ovat kaikki samat osatekijät kuin lumilautailussakin, hyndät, reilit, pipet, pressit ym. , joita laskijat käyttävät hyväkseen. Kärjistäen nykyään voi tehdä suksilla kaikkea, mikä on tehtävissä lumilaudalla. Tällä hetkellä newschool -laskettelu on jo salonkikelpoista urheilua ja integroitumassa osaksi muuta freestyle-hiihtoa.

Friåkning, skidåkning som publiceras genom foton i skidtidningar och filmer. Utvecklades från Hot Dog-kulturen på 70-talet till extremskidåkning med Jesper Rönnbäck och hans kumpaner i Free Radicals. Utvecklades till dagens jibbing med namn som Jon Olsson och Jacob Wester Framgångsrika svenska profiler är också Sverre Lillieqvist och Kaj Zachrisson som är kärnan i Swedish Posse

Freeskiing, or Newschool skiing is a specific type of skiing. It is a subset of Freestyle skiing, although many participants view it as a separate sport and do not refer to it as freestyle. The sport does not require participants to compete, but there are competitive events available at every level of the sport. There are currently two Olympic freeskiing events, Superpipe and Slopestyle. These events make up two of the four Olympic freestyle skiing events. The sport has seen continual growth since its inception in the late 1990s. An entire industry has been created with this rapid popularization. As a result of this growth, there is currently a growing number of professional freeskiers. Most are highly competitive skiers, usually specializing in a certain freeskiing discipline. There are however professional skiers who do not compete, and rather produce and star in videos. Freeskiing or Newschool skiing involves tricks, jumps, and terrain park features, such as rails, boxes, jibs, or other obstacles. This form of skiing resulted from a combination of the growth in popularity of snowboarding as well as the progression of Freestyle skiing. "Newschoolers", or those who specifically ski in this style (as opposed to traditional freestylers, big mountain skiers, racers, etc. ) are often found in terrain parks, which are designed specifically for tricks.

Freeskiing ou Newschool e um estilo de esqui que envolve manobras, saltos, e as características do terreno do parque, tais como calhas, caixas, lanças, ou outros obstáculos. O formato resultou de uma combinação do crescimento da popularidade do snowboarding, bem como da progressão do esqui Freestyle. "Newschoolers", ou aqueles que especificamente esquiam neste estilo (em oposição a freestylers tradicionais, os esquiadores de montanha grande, pilotos, etc. ) são frequentemente encontrados em parques de terreno, que são projetados especificamente para exibições. Referências

Il newschool skiing è una nuova disciplina sciistica freestyle, esistente da non più di 10 anni. Nato prevalentemente negli USA, il freestyle newschool è ispirato allo snowboard da cui ha preso numerosi trick (evoluzioni) e lo stile nel senso più generale. Lo sci freestyle newschool si svolge prevalentemente negli snowpark: parti di pista appositamente creati per snowboarder e appunto sciatori newschool dove sono presenti linee di kicker (salti) halfpipe (mezzo tubo) e rails (per intenderci i tubi metallici da "grindare", su cui scivolare) oltre agli snowpark, il freestyle si può effettuare anche in backcountry (fuoripista in neve fresca) e in street (maggiormente rails). Gli sci da freestyle, come le tavole da snowboard, hanno una struttura twin tip ovvero hanno le punte sia davanti che dietro per permettere di atterrare e di prendere i salti in switch (all'indientro). Negli ultimi anni questa disciplina sta diventando sempre più popolare soprattutto in paesi come Austria, Francia e Australia. Negli ultimi anni inoltre, questo sport ha avuto uno sviluppo veramente notevole con l'invenzione di molteplici trick soprattutto negli Stati Uniti.
